Class HE_Halfedge

java.lang.Object
  wblut.hemesh.core.HE_Halfedge

public class HE_Halfedge
extends java.lang.Object

Half-edge element of half-edge data structure.

Author:
Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
